issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

epic.name: Provide more and better publicized Alloy samples & demos
epic.summary: Make existing and new Alloy samples & demos more prominent and available

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The Alloy repo contains many sample projects. However, developers seem to be unaware that they exist. We need to make them more prominent. This will include updates to documentation, moving some samples to be importable through Studio, and perhaps other changes. 

Please investigate and document (in this ticket) the options we have to publicize and publish these apps. Ideas might include better documentation, including more samples within Studio (Dashboard or Samples view), create a KitchenSink-like master app that includes all the samples, etc.

In the Alloy repo, under _alloy/test/apps_, we have a collection of individual apps demonstrating a specific concept. It is very similar to the classic Kitchen Sink demo app, but are not consolidated into on single app yet.
fields.summary: Document the ways we can publicize the Alloy sample apps
